title: Introduction to Ruby on Rails
introduction: Ruby on Rails, often referred to as Rails, is a popular web framework written in Ruby. It follows the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture and promotes convention over configuration.
details: Rails provides a wide range of built-in features, allowing developers to build fully functional web applications with minimal effort. It comes with an ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) system, automated testing, and routing conventions. Learning Ruby on Rails involves understanding ActiveRecord, views, controllers, and working with gems.
